name: Spectral Fiend Conquers the World
description:
Spectral Fiend Conquers the World is an autobiographical masterpiece starring the one and only! 

Travel around the world and make others weep before you. 

Suck it, Nyamco! I don't need your meddling to make a video game. I don't need any publisher, period! I can just operate independently and let the cash and publicity roll in.
